languages.text: "Надеялся, что такой ответ отобьет у вас интерес. Я не могу ответить иначе как честно и исчерпывающе, а история та еще — про потерю конечностей и мерзких отродий. Вольному Торговцу такое может и не понравиться".

"I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."
languages.original_text: "Надеялся, что такой ответ отобьет у вас интерес. Я не могу ответить иначе как честно и исчерпывающе, а история та еще — про потерю конечностей и мерзких отродий. Вольному Торговцу такое может и не понравиться".

traits.locale_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and hideous abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

"I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and hideous abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

"I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

"I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

"I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

"I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

languages.text: 「ただ、あなたを思いとどまらせることができればと思っただけです。私は物事をありのまま正確に語ることしかできませんし、四肢を失った話や嫌悪すべき化け物の話なんて…ローグトレーダーがそんな話を聞かされて喜ぶかどうか、正直わかりませんでしたから」
languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ、あなたを思いとどまらせることができればと思っただけです。私は物事をありのまま正確に語ることしかできませんし、四肢を失った話や嫌悪すべき化け物の話なんて…ローグトレーダーがそんな話を聞かされて喜ぶかどうか、正直わかりませんでしたから」

languages.text: "Ich wollte Euch lediglich davon abhalten, nachzufragen. Ich kann nur vollständig und präzise berichten, und diese Geschichte über abgetrennte Gliedmaßen und verkommene Abscheulichkeiten ... Ich war nicht sicher, ob {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sich so etwas wirklich anhören will."
languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte Euch lediglich davon abhalten, nachzufragen. Ich kann nur vollständig und präzise berichten, und diese Geschichte über abgetrennte Gliedmaßen und verkommene Abscheulichkeiten ... Ich war nicht sicher, ob {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sich so etwas wirklich anhören will."

languages.text: « J'espérais simplement vous décourager. Je ne sais que fournir des rapports exacts et détaillés, et cette histoire de membres arrachés et d'abominations... Je n'étais pas certain qu'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} apprécierait un tel récit. »
languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

traits.locale_text: « J'espérais simplement vous décourager. Je ne sais que fournir des rapports exacts et détaillés, et cette histoire de membres arrachés et d'abominations... Je n'étais pas certain qu'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} apprécierait un tel récit. »

languages.text: «Esperaba disuadirle. No sé proporcionar información que no sea un relato exhaustivo y preciso, y esta historia contiene miembros cercenados y abominaciones mutantes... No estaba seguro de que {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente tuviera interés por escuchar todo eso».
languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

traits.locale_text: «Esperaba disuadirle. No sé proporcionar información que no sea un relato exhaustivo y preciso, y esta historia contiene miembros cercenados y abominaciones mutantes... No estaba seguro de que {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente tuviera interés por escuchar todo eso».

languages.text: “我只希望这种说法能让你失去兴趣。我只知道如何以完整、准确的方式来描述事情。这个故事涉及到被砍断的肢体以及令人憎恶的怪物……我不确定行商浪人是否愿意听这些内容。”
languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

traits.locale_text: “我只希望这种说法能让你失去兴趣。我只知道如何以完整、准确的方式来描述事情。这个故事涉及到被砍断的肢体以及令人憎恶的怪物……我不确定行商浪人是否愿意听这些内容。”

languages.text: "Sizi bu konudan caydıracağını ummuştum. Yalnızca tam ve keskin bir şekilde anlatmayı bilirim. Ayrıca eksilen uzuvlar ve iğrenç yaratıklara dair bir hikâye bu... Bir Hür Tacir'in tüm bunları dinlemek zorunda kalmasından keyif alıp almayacağından emin olamadım."
languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi bu konudan caydıracağını ummuştum. Yalnızca tam ve keskin bir şekilde anlatmayı bilirim. Ayrıca, eksilen uzuvlar ve iğrenç yaratıklar hakkında bir hikâye bu... Bir Hür Tacir'in tüm bunları dinlemek zorunda kalmasından keyif alıp almayacağından emin olamadım."

languages.original_text: "I just hoped it would discourage you. I only know how to give a full and exact account, and this story about lost limbs and odious abominations... I wasn't sure if a Rogue Trader would appreciate having to listen to all that."
